title: Minestrone primavera
description: Spring vegetables - asparagus, peas and broad beans – are made into a fresh-tasting soup, served with a dollop of fresh pesto on top.
ingredients: 200g/7oz waxy potatoes, peeled and cut into 1cm/½in cubes
500ml/18fl oz fresh chicken stock (or vegetable stock)
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 garlic clove, finely chopped, crushed with a little salt
4 tbsp grated parmesan cheese (or vegetarian alternative)
